title: guess_and_check
content:
GUESS-AND-CHECK
Used when no simple formula exists.
Example: Find cube root of x.
Guess: Start with a value and increment until guessÂ³ is close to x.
Set tolerance (epsilon) for how close is close enough.

Example structure:
epsilon = 0.01
guess = 0.0
increment = 0.0001
num_guesses = 0
while abs(guess**3 - x) >= epsilon:
    guess += increment
    num_guesses += 1
